item.title: Mimblewimble And Scriptless Scripts
item.description: {% if page.transcript_by %} Transcript by: {{ page.transcript_by }}{% endif %} Mimblewimble and scriptless scripts Andrew Poelstra (Blockstream) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ovCBT1gyk9c https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/954531580848082944 We’re about ready for the second session of RWC. We are going to move on to cryptocurrencies. So we have 3 talks lined up in this session. The first one is on mimblewimble and scriptless scripts, delivered by Andrew Poelstra from Blockstream. Introduction Thank you. Cool. Hello. My name is Andrew Poelstra.
